name: Dismissible
desc: A widget that can be dismissed by dragging in the indicated [direction].

fields.name: child
fields.desc: The widget below this widget in the tree.

fields.name: background
fields.desc: A widget that is stacked behind the child. If secondaryBackground is also specified then this widget only appears when the child has been dragged down or to the right.

fields.name: secondaryBackground
fields.desc: A widget that is stacked behind the child and is exposed when the child has been dragged up or to the left. It may only be specified when background has also been specified.

fields.name: confirmDismiss
fields.desc: Gives the app an opportunity to confirm or veto a pending dismissal.

fields.name: onResize
fields.desc: Called when the widget changes size (i.e., when contracting before being dismissed).

fields.name: onDismissed
fields.desc: Called when the widget has been dismissed, after finishing resizing.

fields.name: direction
fields.desc: The direction in which the widget can be dismissed.

fields.name: resizeDuration
fields.desc: The amount of time the widget will spend contracting before [onDismissed] is called.

fields.name: dismissThresholds
fields.desc: The offset threshold the item has to be dragged in order to be considered dismissed.

fields.name: movementDuration
fields.desc: Defines the duration for card to dismiss or to come back to original position if not dismissed.

fields.name: crossAxisEndOffset
fields.desc: Defines the end offset across the main axis after the card is dismissed.

fields.name: dragStartBehavior
fields.desc: Determines the way that drag start behavior is handled.

fields.name: behavior
fields.desc: How to behave during hit tests.

fields.name: onUpdate
fields.desc: Called when the dismissible widget has been dragged.
